column4: how do i encode in h263 using ffmpeg... in spite of installing all missing codecs its showing "Incorrect parameters" though i use standard qcif resolution
isnt' the ffmpeg in ubuntu crippled or did they resolve that?
oh is it coz it is crippled eh? in hardy it worked perfectly so i thought it'd work
hrm... shouldn't be much different from hardy's version. You can see if medibuntu has a ffmpeg that will be uncrippled definately
